name: 7.1 "How to Recede in Business" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: How much time did Sam say he had to get Rebecca to go out with him?
questions.explanation:
30 minutes.

	With Evan Drake gone, Sam decided he needed to make his move. He figured he timed it so she was over Drake but not over him enough to have moved on to another man.

questions.text: What kind of car was Rebecca looking at getting?
questions.explanation:
Mercedes.

	Rebecca knew the car would cost her a lot. She said she'd have to work extra hours and give up lunches for a long time.

questions.text: Who was the new executive vice-president?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Stone

	Stone was played by Brian Bedford. Bedford was born February 16, 1935 in England.

questions.text: Did Rebecca agree to go out with Sam?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Sam asked her if it was pity so he'd know how to dress. She stated that since Evan left her standards in a guy are really low.

questions.text: Did Norm get Vera anything on their first date?
questions.explanation:
No.

	He said that Vera got him a gift on their first date. Then he said, "In retrospect I guess I should have gotten her something". Norm has never been very passionate when it came to his wife. Now beer, beer he is passionate about.

questions.text: Who got fired in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	They said there was a slight improvement since last month with Rebecca as the manager of the bar. However, they said the bar did much better under Sam's care and made him the new manager of Cheers, and fired Rebecca.

her barrette.

	Rebecca came into the bar looking very messy so Sam asked her if she had a barrette for her hair. She replied, "I lost it." She was not dealing well at all with being fired from her job.

questions.text: Did Sam like being the manager?
questions.explanation:
no.

	He told Carla he wanted to tell Rebecca to take her job back because he didn't want it. Carla made him realize that if he played it right, Rebecca would be very grateful to him for getting her job back.

frozen Snicker bars.

	Rebecca commented that she knew Sam's favorite dessert was frozen Snicker bars. Sam had ordered something else however to impress Rebecca.

yes.

	Rebecca said she would never serve drinks. However, she then found out she could get the mercedes she wanted and through tears said, "May I take your order?"
